meanings.definition: A starchy flour made from the dried tubers of certain orchids, used in cooking and as a thickening agent.
meanings.sent1: The chef used salep to thicken the soup.
meanings.sent2: I bought salep to bake a cake.
meanings.sent3: The salep spilled all over the kitchen, creating a starchy mess.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was like salep, adding substance to the project.
meanings.sent5: The salep transformed the watery mixture into a thick, creamy sauce.

meanings.definition: A drink made from salep flour, typically served hot and flavored with cinnamon.
meanings.sent1: During winter, I enjoy sipping on a cup of salep.
meanings.sent2: The cafe served delicious salep with a sprinkle of cinnamon.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally spilled the hot salep on his lap, causing a sticky situation.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of salep filled the room, comforting everyone present.
meanings.sent5: The salep warmed me up from the inside, like a cozy blanket on a cold night.
